p: It is important to highlight some facts: intuitively, all pertinent SDGs (6) express the economic dimensions. Most of them entail both the economic and social dimensions combined, which are widely covered all over the SDGs (5 of the 6 SDGs examined). Another SDG pertains only to the economic dimension. As the fourth pillar of sustainability (Meadows et al., 1972) governance is only considered in 1 of the 17 SDGs. Importantly, the environmental dimension is neglected, not appearing in any of the examined SDGs (0).
